Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '

#create dataframe for the sstconsignemntunion lms table
sstconsignemntunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstconsignmentunion.parquet/', format='parquet')
sstconsignemntunion.createOrReplaceTempView("sstconsignemntunion")

#create dataframe for the sstparcelbyconsignment lms table
sstparcelbyconsignment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcelbyconsignment.parquet', format='parquet')
sstparcelbyconsignment.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelbyconsignment")

#create dataframe for the dbobill_consignmentr lms table
dbobill_consignmentr = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbobill_consignmentr.parquet', format='parquet')
dbobill_consignmentr.createOrReplaceTempView("dbobill_consignmentr")

#create dataframe for the sstparcelunion lms table
sstparcelunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcelunion.parquet', format='parquet')
sstparcelunion.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelunion")

#create dataframe for the dbowaybill lms table
dbowaybill = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbowaybill.parquet', format='parquet')
dbowaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("dbowaybill")

#Create DataFrame for the dbodc_transfer LMS Table
dbodc_transfer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbodc_transfer.parquet', format='parquet')
dbodc_transfer.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodc_transfer")

#create dataframe for the publicdispatchsegment orv table
publicdispatchsegment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicdispatchsegment.parquet', format='parquet')
publicdispatchsegment.createOrReplaceTempView("publicdispatchsegment")

#create dataframe for the publicorvuser orv table
publicorvuser = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicorvuser.parquet', format='parquet')
publicorvuser.createOrReplaceTempView("publicorvuser")

#create dataframe for the publicvehicle orv table
publicvehicle = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicvehicle.parquet', format='parquet')
publicvehicle.createOrReplaceTempView("publicvehicle")

publicdepot.createOrReplaceTempView("publicdepot")

publiccustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publiccustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
publiccustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("publiccustomer")

dbocustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbocustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
dbocustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("dbocustomer")

#create dataframe for the dbozone lms table
dbozone = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbozone.parquet', format='parquet')
dbozone.createOrReplaceTempView("dbozone")

dbosroute.createOrReplaceTempView("dbosroute")

dbobillzoneroute.createOrReplaceTempView("dbobillzoneroute")

dbolocation.createOrReplaceTempView("dbolocation")

#Create DataFrame for the dbodepot LMS Table

dbodepot.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodepot")

dbovehicle.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovehicle")

publicpod.createOrReplaceTempView("publicpod")

dbodb_reasondetail.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodb_reasondetail")

stpod.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stpod.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stinservicereasons.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stinservicereasons.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stdispatchsegment.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stdispatchsegment.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
storvuser.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/storvuser.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stvehicle.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stvehicle.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stdepotorv.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stdepotorv.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stdepot.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stdepot.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stbillcustomer.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stbillcustomer.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stdeliverypickupcustomer.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stdeliverypickupcustomer.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stzone.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stzone.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stsroute.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stsroute.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stbillzoneroute.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stbillzoneroute.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stbillzone.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stbillzone.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stlocation.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stlocation.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
stendorsmentreason.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stendorsmentreason.parquet', mode = "overwrite")

#create dataframe for the publicclaim orv table
publicclaim = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicclaim.parquet', format='parquet')

dbowaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("dbowaybill")
